create.title: Create organization
create.description: Create a new organization to manage your team and projects.
create.info: Your organization name should be unique and descriptive.

join.title: Join organization
join.description: Join an organization to collaborate with your team, manage projects efficiently, and access shared resources.

header.title: Organization settings
header.description: Manage your organization settings and preferences.

disclaimer.title: You have been invited to join an organization
disclaimer.description: Sign in or create an account to accept the invitation and join the organization.

expired.title: Invitation not found or expired
expired.description: The invitation you are looking for is either expired or does not exist. Please contact the organization owner to renew the invite.

emailMismatch.title: You're currently logged in with a different account
emailMismatch.description: The email you are trying to use does not match the invitation email. Please sign in as <bold>{{email}}</bold> or contact the organization owner to update the invitation.

invitation.title: Join {{organizationName}}
invitation.description: <bold>{{inviterEmail}}</bold> has invited you to join <bold>{{organizationName}}</bold> on TurboStarter.

banner.description: Click to review the details and accept or reject the invitation.

list.title: Pending invitations
list.description: View and manage your pending invitations.

header.title: Organization members
header.description: Manage your organization members, invitations and roles.

invite.title: Invite member
invite.description: To add a new member to your organization, send them an invitation.
invite.info: You can invite multiple members at once.
invite.missingPermission: You need additional permissions to invite members to this organization.

email.subject: You have been invited to join an organization
email.body: <bold>{{inviter}}</bold> has invited you to join <bold>{{organization}}</bold> on TurboStarter.
email.or: Or, copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.disclaimer: If you were not expecting this invitation, there's nothing to worry about, you can safely ignore this email.

role.title: Update {{name}}'s role
role.description: Change the role of the selected member by selecting it from the dropdown menu.
role.info: The role determines the permissions of the member.

edit.description: Please enter your organization name, or a display name you are comfortable with.
edit.missingPermission: You need additional permissions to manage your organization's name.

logo.description:
This is your organization logo.
Click on the logo to upload a custom one from your files.
logo.info: While not required, adding a logo is highly recommended.
logo.missingPermission: You need additional permissions to manage your organization's logo.

leave.title: Leave organization
leave.description: Revoke your access to this organization. Any resources you've added to the organization will remain.
leave.disclaimer:
Are you sure you want to leave this organization?

You will no longer have access to its resources and will need to be invited again to join.

Do you want to continue?
leave.success: You have left the organization successfully!
leave.cannotLeaveAsOnlyOwner: To leave this organization, ensure at least one more member has the Owner role.

delete.title: Delete organization
delete.description: Permanently remove this organization and all of its contents from the TurboStarter platform. This action is not reversible, so please continue with caution.
delete.disclaimer:
You are about to delete this organization. 

After deleting it, all organization data (including members and teams) will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered. 

Do you want to continue?
delete.missingPermission: You need additional permissions to delete this organization.

error.cannotCreateNew: You cannot create a new organization.
error.maximumNumberOfOrganizations: You have reached the maximum number of organizations.
error.alreadyExists: An organization with this name already exists.
error.userNotMember: You are not a member of this organization.
error.userAlreadyMember: You are already a member of this organization.
error.cannotLeaveAsOnlyOwner: You cannot leave the organization as the only owner.
error.cannotLeaveWithoutOwner: You cannot leave the organization without an owner.
error.membershipLimitReached: You have reached the membership limit for this organization.

team.cannotCreateNew: You cannot create a new team.
team.alreadyExists: A team with this name already exists.
team.maximumNumberOfTeams: You have reached the maximum number of teams.
team.unableToRemoveLastTeam: You cannot remove the last team.
team.cannotCreate: You cannot create a team in this organization.
team.cannotDelete: You cannot delete a team in this organization.
team.cannotUpdate: You cannot update a team in this organization.
team.cannotAccessMembers: You cannot access the members of this team.
team.memberLimitReached: You have reached the member limit for this team.
team.userNotMember: You are not a member of this team.
team.cannotCreateNewMember: You cannot create a new member.

invitation.cannotInviteUsers: You cannot invite users to this organization.
invitation.userAlreadyInvited: This user is already invited to this organization.
invitation.notRecipient: You are not the recipient of this invitation.
invitation.inviterNoLongerMember: The inviter is no longer a member of the organization.
invitation.cannotInviteUserWithRole: You cannot invite a user with this role.
invitation.emailVerificationRequired: Email verification is required before accepting or rejecting an invitation.
invitation.limitReached: You have reached the invitation limit for this organization.

ac.mustBeInOrganizationToCreateRole: You must be in an organization to create a role.
ac.tooManyRoles: You have reached the maximum number of roles.
ac.cannotDeletePreDefinedRole: You cannot delete a pre-defined role.
ac.roleNameAlreadyTaken: The role name is already taken.
